name: Absin
description:
Welcome to the initial release of the game "Absin".

This project took me 8 months and ~270 hours. It is the most comprehensive title I have yet produced.

Inside this folder is everything you'll need to play the adventure game and help with the game design process. 

If you're feeling constructive, inside as well is a .doc file which can be filled out and emailed back to me for feedback. 
This is very helpful for me to continue making games. 

BEWARE: There is no saving or loading, so be prepared for a full experience of about an hour when you start.

Thank you for participating and please,

Enjoy the game!

-Fransis <3
